name: Seated Knee Tuck
how_to_perform:
1. Sit on the edge of a chair or bench with your feet flat on the floor.
2. Lean back slightly and lift one leg off the ground, keeping it straight.
3. Tuck the heel of your lifted leg towards your glutes.
4. Keep the lifted leg in this position for an brief moment to achieve maximum engagement.
5. Slowly lower your lifted leg back down to its original position on the floor without touching or bending, repeat on the other side.
short_summary: Seated knee tucks are a strength training exercise targeting the quads and hamstrings while seated on a chair or bench, promoting muscle growth
